summary: AppShell header was updated to include a left-grouped logo image next to the unchanged title, with appropriate alt text and layout classes. However, the required static logo asset file under frontend/public/assets/generated does not appear to have been added in this diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the provided logo image as a static frontend asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference it from the header logo element (do not load it via the backend).
missing_requirements.reason: The header references `/assets/generated/app-logo.dim_256x256.png`, but the diff shows no added files, so the required static asset file is not evidenced as present under `frontend/public/assets/generated`.
evidence: File diff summary: Added files: none
